column3: Latest;Oddar Meanchey: Ten secondary school students in grades 7
column4: 8 and 9 fainted at 8.15 am on February 28th 2019 in Hun Sen Tuol Ta Sek school
column5: Trapeang Prasat.------The students all said that they had seen a ghost
column6: causing them to collapse in fear.------However
column7: a medical examination of the students
column8: who were all girls aged between 13 and 16
column9: confirmed they were suffering from exhaustion
column10: most likely through lack of sleep
column11: and low blood pressure.------The girls were given treatment in a local clinic and sent home to rest.
